blackengine.dataAccess.dataObjects

Class MeshDataObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.dataAccess.dataObjects.MeshDataObject

  • public class MeshDataObject
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class represents a mesh loaded in from disk through the MeshLoader. An instance of this class is immutable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MeshDataObject(float[] vertexPositions, float[] textureCoords, float[] normals, int[] indices, int numberOfDimensions)
      Default constructor for creating a new instance of MeshDataObject.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int calculateVertexCount()
      Calculates the vertex count by dividing the amount of vertex coordinates by the number of dimensions.
      int[] getIndices()
      Getter for the indices array.
      float[] getNormals()
      Getter for the normal vector array.
      float[] getTextureCoords()
      Getter for the texture coordinate array.
      float[] getVertexPositions()
      Getter for the vertex position array.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeshDataObject

        public MeshDataObject(float[] vertexPositions,
                      float[] textureCoords,
                      float[] normals,
                      int[] indices,
                      int numberOfDimensions)
        Default constructor for creating a new instance of MeshDataObject.
        Parameters:
        vertexPositions - The position coordinates of all vertices in a float array.
        textureCoords - The texture coordinates of all vertices in a float array.
        normals - The normal vectors in a float array.
        indices - The indices in an integer array.
        numberOfDimensions - The number of dimensions this mesh is in.

    • Method Detail

      • getVertexPositions

        public float[] getVertexPositions()
        Getter for the vertex position array.
        Returns:
        A float array containing all coordinates of all vertices.

      • getTextureCoords

        public float[] getTextureCoords()
        Getter for the texture coordinate array.
        Returns:
        A float array containing all texture coordinates of all vertices.

      • getNormals

        public float[] getNormals()
        Getter for the normal vector array.
        Returns:
        A float array containing all normal vectors.

      • getIndices

        public int[] getIndices()
        Getter for the indices array.
        Returns:
        An integer array containing all indices for this mesh.

      • calculateVertexCount

        public int calculateVertexCount()
        Calculates the vertex count by dividing the amount of vertex coordinates by the number of dimensions.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the amount of vertices that are present in this mesh.
